relationships.description: Indicates the survey collects revised imputed data for various mental health measures.
Indicates the survey collects individual imputed data for various mental health measures.
Indicates the survey measures mental health aspects such as feeling effortful, down, difficulty in remembering or concentrating over the worst months.
